General.Name: Youngy Co Ltd
General.Description: YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. operates in the lithium energy industry. It engages in the research and development, production, and sales of lithium salt products, such as lithium carbonate, lithium hydroxide, and lithium chloride; non-ferrous products comprising cobalt, nickel, copper, and lithium, as well as cobalt tetroxide for use in manufacturing of lithium-ion battery cathode materials; and positive and negative electrode materials, including lithium cobalt oxide, ternary materials, and lithium iron phosphate for secondary charging power supplies. The company is also involved in the new energy materials trading business. The company was formerly known as Luxiang Co., Ltd. and changed its name to YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. in August 2015. YOUNGY Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Guangzhou International Finance Center, Guangzhou, China, 510623
